name: Pong - A Retro Experience
description:
Pong has all the features you want to experience, a blast of nostalgic fun! Control your paddle with your finger. The first player to reach five points wins the match. In Endless mode, the game continues until you miss the ball. This allows players to test themselves and improve their high score. Play alone or with a friend as you attempt to become the victor.

Features:
- Local Two-player Matches
- Three Single-player Difficulty Settings
- Endless mode with a High Score
- Old-school Graphics
- Classic Sound Effects
- A Retro Pong Game
